var randomBot=function randomBot(chess,updateComputerHistory,setRandomBotAvaliableMoves,setFen){// computer response random
setTimeout(function(){// Get list of valid moves
var moves=chess.moves();// update state for data vizualization
setRandomBotAvaliableMoves(moves);// If valid move is avaliable selects random and updates chessboard
if(moves.length>0){var computerMove=moves[Math.floor(Math.random()*moves.length)];chess.move(computerMove);// add move to history
updateComputerHistory(computerMove);// update chessboard
setFen(chess.fen());}},300);};export default randomBot;
